name: MassText
short_description:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
PLEASE USE http://erikthiem.github.com/masstext/ INSTEAD
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This project has been abandoned by both of its creators. However, I have re-done MassText in Ruby and going to the above link will get you to the new page.

-Erik Thiem
